rules_text:
Trample
[i]Aegis[/i] – Whenever Stahl becomes tapped, prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to him and another target creature you control until end of turn.
[i]Promoted Class[/i] – {2}{G} [i](You may put this card over another Stahl creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
